definitions.definition: a low area of land between hills or mountains, typically with a river or stream flowing through it.
examples: dale, vale; Morehollow, basin, gully, gorge, ravine, coulee, trough, canyon, rift; glen; literarydell "the homes in the valley are subject to mudslides"Morehollow, basin, gully, gorge, ravine, coulee, trough, canyon, rift; glen; dell the homes in the valley are subject to mudslides

definitions.definition: an internal angle formed by the intersecting planes of a roof, or by the slope of a roof and a wall.
